name: 10 The Pelican Brief Questions | Authors Trivia Quiz

questions.text: What is the main female character's name?
questions.explanation:
Darby Shaw.

	A student at Tulane Law School.

questions.text: What is the main male character's name?
What is the occupation of the main male character?
questions.explanation:
Reporter.

	He is a {reporter;} Darby is a law student.

questions.text: What is the name of the assassin?
What is the President of the United States's name?
questions.explanation:
They don't say.

	It seems when there is a fictional president you almost NEVER know their name...

questions.text: Of what race is the main male character?
questions.explanation:
White & Caucasian.

	In the movie he is African American (played by Denzel Washington), so don't get confused - this quiz is about the book!

questions.text: What is the White House janitor's name?
questions.explanation:
Sarge & sarge & SARGE.

	Grizzled old Sarge, he hears everything...

questions.text: What is the name of the main female character's boyfriend (and professor)?
questions.explanation:
Thomas Callahan.

	She was sleeping with him too, and he's probably twice as old as her. By the way, Gavin Verheek was his best friend.

questions.text: How did the main female character's boyfriend/professor die?
questions.correct: He was in his car and it blew up
options: He was smothered with a pillow
A bomb was planted in his house
questions.explanation:
He was in his car and it blew up.

	He and Darby are going home from the {bar;} he is drunk and insists on driving. She walks home and is saved from the bomb.

questions.text: What document was it that started the whole mess?
questions.explanation:
The Pelican Brief.

	If you didn't get that one...
